channel.title: Need help with persistant error!
channel.description:
i have had this error for the past week now
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server[/code]
when i open runserver.bat :eek:
i have jdk and jre 1.5.0_09
might be the classpaths but im not sure cause ive tried loads of times with user varibles... could it be the system varibles? :confused:[br][size=1]Posted at: October 15, 2006, 06:47:47 AM[/size][hr]Anybody? I think ive screwed up my system classpaths instead of user ones :( can somebody help or tell me wat their system varibles are please ;D
